metadata.title: CVE-2024-7383 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in libnbd. The client did not always correctly verify theNBD server's certificate when using TLS to connect to an NBD server. Thisissue allows a man-in-the-middle attack on NBD traffic.

criterions.comment: libnbd package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
